document_data.caption: A map showing Sabbar's Alley and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Sabbar's Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Sabbar's Alley''' was a small back alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Sabbar's Alley was located in the northwest section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. The alley branched east off of the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]], terminating at a two dead ends behind some buildings just south of [[Aureenar Street]].
